original_title: Retired detective who survived 2023 shooting found dead in Montana lake | Fox News
article_summary: Retired Washington detective David Easterly, who survived being shot in the line of duty in 2023, has passed away in a boating incident in Montana. Easterly, 67, died on Saturday and his body was recovered from Flathead Lake on Tuesday. He served at the King County Sheriff's Office for 25 years.</s>
